content: Do not deviate from the plan - if deviations needed, STOP and ask user
Add new error variants to BrpMcpError in src/error.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding error variants
Fix remaining unwrap in src/support/service.rs:21
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after service.rs fix
Convert watch operations to use BrpMcpError::WatchOperation
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after watch operations conversion
Convert process management to use BrpMcpError::ProcessManagement
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after process management conversion
Convert parameter extraction to use BrpMcpError::ParameterExtraction
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after parameter extraction conversion
Convert log operations to use BrpMcpError::LogOperation
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after log operations conversion
Create TierInfo helper methods to reduce duplication
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after TierInfo refactoring
Create TierManager to encapsulate tier pattern
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after TierManager implementation
Run cargo clippy with strict settings and fix all issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt to format all code
Run cargo nextest run and review any test failures
Task subagent for code review focusing on duplication and complexity
Review subagent suggestions with user before proceeding
